channel.title: Comments on: Database Mail Won’t Deliver to Distribution Group
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: steve t
item.dc:creator: steve t
item.description: I'm facing a similiar/same problem and I've checked my settings and the email guys sent me a screenshot which looks exactly like yours, but I still get a permission denied. Any thoughts?
item.content:encoded: I’m facing a similiar/same problem and I’ve checked my settings and the email guys sent me a screenshot which looks exactly like yours, but I still get a permission denied. Any thoughts?
